overview: Size matters! They're tiny and blonde, but don't let their petite size fool you. Hard X is proud to present, "Little Blondes Go Black" featuring the tiniest of blondes taking on the biggest of dongs. These cuties are all under 5'3, including young Piper Perri who is only 4'10 taking on Rico Strong's 12 inches! This disc also features a very rare IR scene from Aaliyah Love and not just one, but two anal scenes from cuties Zoey Monroe & Alina West. Do not miss this latest Hard X release.
title: Little Blondes Go Black
